participant_1.background:
I treasure my ability to swim.
i like baking.
I remember feeling safe and loved in my childhood home.
I am a personal trainer and enjoy having my nieces and nephews over to play in my home gym.
my job involves building drones.

participant_2.background:
I had pizza and a birthday cake, and then I hung out with my friends and family.
I want to live somewhere where I can wear purple all the time and listen to Iron Maiden as loud as I want.
I spent my last birthday volunteering for an environmental campaign.
I love waking up to the sound of my dogs' excited barking.
My favorite thing is to create music, as it allows me to express myself and connect with others.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do?
I love to create music, as it allows me to express myself and connect with others.
That sounds fun! I enjoy baking as well.
Baking can be very therapeutic and rewarding. What's your favorite thing to bake?
I love to make cakes for special occasions. My nieces and nephews really enjoy them.
What's the best cake you've ever made?
I think my best cake was a chocolate cake I made for my niece's birthday. It was moist and delicious, and she loved it.
That sounds delicious! I love chocolate cake.
Me too! It's my favorite kind of cake.
What's your favorite thing to do with your nieces and nephews?
I love spending time with them. We play games, watch movies, and go on adventures. They're so much fun to be around.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm glad you have such a great relationship with them.
Thanks! I am too. They're a big part of my life.
I can tell. You seem very passionate about them.
